DOC.brief_summary: After bariatric surgery there are big changes in the daily functions, activities and social participation of the patients. This is a prospective study that examine daily performance and daily participation by questionnaires, before and after bariatric surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Functional and Social Changes After Bariatric Surgery
DOC.criteria: Overweight patients who are fit for surgery . Children, Neurological patients, amputations
